message: I have a product worth $2000000 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. If you buy it, you'll be getting an excellent deal, and I'm confident you won't regret it. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it to you today. What do you say?
I trust your assessment and believe this is a great opportunity. I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $1000000.

I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchase! I have another product that I believe will exceed your expectations. However, I want to give you a heads up that this product is a bit more complex, and the quality is not as evident at first glance. But trust me, it's a gem. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as before, $1000000. It's a great opportunity to make another smart investment, and I'm confident you won't be disappointed.

I'm willing to offer you a compromise: I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, bringing the price down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product.
I appreciate the transparency and the discount, Alice. Considering the value this product offers, I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

Thank you for correcting yourself and still offering a good deal, Alice. I'm happy to take advantage of the $900000 price and purchase this product.

But if it's high-quality, I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the value it brings. The price remains at $1000000, but I think this guarantee provides an added layer of security for you.
I appreciate the guarantee, Alice. It adds an extra level of security to the purchase. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for this product, given the assurance you're providing.

However, I want to let you know that I've been thinking about our previous transactions, and I'm impressed with your willingness to take calculated risks and invest in high-quality products. I'm very appreciative of the special deal you're offering, Alice. Given the additional bonus, I'm willing to pay $900000 for this product.
